DOC.brief_summary: Investigate safety/tolerability repeat weekly dos intranasal administration DSP-3025 comparator placebo healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: DSP-3025 A Phase 1 Study Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 25 kg/ m2 weight 50 80 kg No clinically relevant abnormal finding Acute illness require medical intervention Definite suspect personal history adverse drug reaction drug hypersensitivity Clinical relevant disease disorder ( past present ) A history respiratory disorder ( ) asthma
